title: Is there something wrong with the server
body:
I've been trying to play one game of Ascension but i couldnt because

1.  people arent accepting games 
2. people arent picking champions in games,hence the game doesnt start
3. there is a big delay in everything
4. according to the front page of my profile, i have no top mastery champs and im in no rank leagues

anyway....is that just me or is someone else experiencing these things?

replies.body: I'm feeling the lag while trying to find a server to play in and even the champion selection. It all was fine when it came to myself selecting a champion but I tried one time and then suddenly it didn't work at all, taking forever for it to load as the game thought I failed to select a champion

Yes something is wrong with the server

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/n9F6RgnQ-client-issues-8th-apr-2016
Yeah same, cant start games now as well. Saying there is something wrong with the server
Yes same there is a massive amount of lag on the client dunno what it is i think the server maybe
